movie.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
movie.writer: Joss Whedon, Stan Lee (Marvel comics), Jack Kirby (Marvel comics)
movie.actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Evans
movie.plot: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's Mightiest Heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plans.

movie.title: The Avengers
movie.writer: Joss Whedon (screenplay), Zak Penn (story), Joss Whedon (story)
movie.actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
movie.plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 35 wins & 76 nominations.

movie.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movie.writer: Stephen King (short story "Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption"), Frank Darabont (screenplay)
movie.actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
movie.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movie.awards: Nominated for 7 Oscars. Another 14 wins & 20 nominations.

movie.title: Batman Begins
movie.writer: Bob Kane (characters), David S. Goyer (story), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), David S. Goyer (screenplay)
movie.actors: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Katie Holmes
movie.plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his war on crime to free the crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption that the Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 16 wins & 63 nominations.

movie.title: The Dark Knight
movie.writer: Jonathan Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (story), David S. Goyer (story), Bob Kane (characters)
movie.actors: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
movie.plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the caped crusader must come to terms with one of the greatest psychological tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movie.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movie.writer: Jonathan Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (story), David S. Goyer (story), Bob Kane (characters)
movie.actors: Christian Bale, Gary Oldman, Tom Hardy, Joseph Gordon-Levitt
movie.plot: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, the Dark Knight, with the help of the enigmatic Selia, is forced from his imposed exile to save Gotham City, now on the edge of total annihilation, from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 44 wins & 98 nominations.

movie.title: The Revenant
movie.writer: Mark L. Smith (screenplay), Alejandro González Iñárritu (screenplay), Michael Punke (based in part on the novel by)
movie.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hardy, Domhnall Gleeson, Will Poulter
movie.plot: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820's fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.
movie.awards: Nominated for 12 Oscars. Another 29 wins & 118 nominations.

movie.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
movie.writer: Lawrence Kasdan, J.J. Abrams, Michael Arndt, George Lucas (based on characters created by)
movie.actors: Harrison Ford, Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher, Adam Driver
movie.plot: Three decades after the defeat of the Galactic Empire, a new threat arises. The First Order attempts to rule the galaxy and only a ragtag group of heroes can stop them, along with the help of the Resistance.
movie.awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 25 nominations.

movie.title: The Martian
movie.actors: Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig, Jeff Daniels
movie.plot: During a manned mission to Mars, Astronaut Mark Watney is presumed dead after a fierce storm and left behind by his crew. But Watney has survived and finds himself stranded and alone on the hostile planet. With only meager supplies, he must draw upon his ingenuity, wit and spirit to subsist and find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.
movie.awards: Won 2 Golden Globes. Another 16 wins & 117 nominations.

movie.title: Airlift
movie.writer: Ritesh Shah, Suresh Nair, Raja Menon, Rahul Nangia
movie.actors: Akshay Kumar, Nimrat Kaur, Feryna Wazheir, Pawan Chopra
movie.plot: Airlift is an uplifting and entertaining edge-of-the-seat thriller and is the story of the biggest ever human evacuation in the history of mankind.
